channel.title: smtp on Mátyás Budavári
channel.description: Recent content in smtp on Mátyás Budavári

item.title: Quickly test mail sending through SMTP
item.description: In the past few days I’ve been working with a code where I needed to see whether the service successfully sends mails through SMTP. I did not want to use or set up an actual mail server locally. As is turns out Python has a oneliner to solve this situation.
